view.name: comvnusermaster
view.viewQuerySQL: select "tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ESNTL_ID" AS "ESNTL_ID","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_ID" AS "USER_ID","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."PASSWORD" AS "PASSWORD","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_NM" AS "USER_NM","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ZIP" AS "USER_ZIP","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ADRES" AS "USER_ADRES","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_EMAIL_ADRES" AS "USER_EMAIL",' ' AS "GROUP_ID",'GNR' AS "USER_SE",' ' AS "ORGNZT_ID" from "tb_tz_gnrlmber" order by "tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ESNTL_ID"
view.createViewSQL: CREATE VIEW "comvnusermaster" AS select "tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ESNTL_ID" AS "ESNTL_ID","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_ID" AS "USER_ID","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."PASSWORD" AS "PASSWORD","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_NM" AS "USER_NM","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ZIP" AS "USER_ZIP","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ADRES" AS "USER_ADRES","tb_tz_gnrlmber"."MBER_EMAIL_ADRES" AS "USER_EMAIL",' ' AS "GROUP_ID",'GNR' AS "USER_SE",' ' AS "ORGNZT_ID" from "tb_tz_gnrlmber" order by "tb_tz_gnrlmber"."ESNTL_ID"
